scripts.dev: npm run replica && npm run deploy:icpflower && npm run vite
scripts.replica: dfx stop && rm -rf .dfx icpflower-nft-canister/.dfx && dfx start --clean --background
scripts.deploy:icpflower: cd icpflower-nft-canister && dfx deploy --argument '(principal "aaaaa-aa")' staging && dfx canister call staging addAsset '(record {name = "privat";payload = record {ctype = "text/html"; data = vec {blob "hello world!"} } })' && cd ..
